title: Britannia triumphans a masque, presented at White Hall, by the Kings Majestie and his lords, on the Sunday after Twelfth-night, 1637. By Inigo Iones surveyor of his Majesties workes, and William Davenant her Majesties servant.
author: Jones, Inigo, 1573-1652.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Thomas Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop at the flying Horse neere Yorke house,
notes: The years on the title page are given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
